languages.text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become <u>(WP / 2)</u> number of stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their Willpower characteristic even if their current doctrines do not allow it.

When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

languages.text:
当要塞世界的角色失去所有“全力开火”层数时，该层数并不会重置为0，而是会变为{uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf}层。
此外，要塞世界的角色升级时始终可以提高意志{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}，不受当前职业限制。
languages.original_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
当要塞世界的角色失去所有“全力开火”层数时，该层数并不会重置为0，而是会变为<u>（意志/2）</u>层。
此外，要塞世界的角色升级时始终可以提高意志属性，不受当前信条限制。

当要塞世界的角色失去所有“全力开火”层数时，该层数并不会重置为0，而是会变为{uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf}层。
此外，要塞世界的角色升级时始终可以提高意志{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}，不受当前职业限制。

languages.text:
Cuando todas las cargas de No dejes de disparar vayan a perderse, en vez de eso se reducen a {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} acumulaciones.
Además, un personaje de mundo fortaleza puede mejorar su {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} aunque su arquetipo actual no lo permita.
languages.original_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando todas las cargas de No dejes de disparar vayan a perderse, en vez de eso se reducen a <u>(VOL / 2)</u> acumulaciones.
Además, un personaje de mundo fortaleza puede mejorar su Voluntad aunque su doctrina actual no lo permita.

Cuando todas las cargas de No dejes de disparar vayan a perderse, en vez de eso se reducen a {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} acumulaciones.
Además, un personaje de mundo fortaleza puede mejorar su {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de Voluntad aunque su arquetipo actual no lo permita.

languages.text:
Wenn alle Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen verloren gehen sollten, werden sie stattdessen zu {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} Stapeln.
Außerdem kann ein Bollwerkwelt-Charakter seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} upgraden, auch wenn seine aktuellen Archetypen dies nicht zulassen.
languages.original_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn alle Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen verloren gehen sollten, werden sie stattdessen zu <u>(WK / 2)</u> Stapeln.
Außerdem kann ein Bollwerkwelt-Charakter seine Willenskraft-Eigenschaft upgraden, auch wenn seine aktuellen Doktrinen dies nicht zulassen.

Wenn alle Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen verloren gehen sollten, werden sie stattdessen zu {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} Stapeln.
Außerdem kann ein Bollwerkwelt-Charakter seine Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} upgraden, auch wenn seine aktuellen Archetypen dies nicht zulassen.

languages.text:
Lorsque tous les cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus devraient être perdus, ils sont remplacés par {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} cumuls.
De plus, un personnage issu d'un monde forteresse peut améliorer sa {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} même si ses archétypes actuels ne le permettent pas.
languages.original_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque tous les cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus devraient être perdus, ils sont remplacés par {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} cumuls.
De plus, un personnage issu d'un monde forteresse peut améliorer sa {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} même si ses archétypes actuels ne le permettent pas.

Lorsque tous les cumuls de Tirs Ininterrompus devraient être perdus, ils sont remplacés par {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} cumuls.
De plus, un personnage issu d'un monde forteresse peut améliorer sa {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} Force Mentale même si ses archétypes actuels ne le permettent pas.

languages.text:
Когда персонаж теряет все уровни "стрелять изо всех сил", он сразу же получает {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} уровней этого эффекта.
Также персонаж с мира-крепости может повышать значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}, даже если выбранный {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}архетип{/g} этого не позволяет.
languages.original_text:
When all stacks of never stop shooting should be lost, they become {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} stacks instead.
Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж теряет все уровни "стрелять изо всех сил", он сразу же получает <u>(ВОЛ / 2)</u> уровней этого эффекта.
Также персонаж из мира-крепости может повышать значение Воли, даже если выбранная доктрина этого не позволяет.

Когда персонаж теряет все уровни "стрелять изо всех сил", он сразу же получает {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} уровней этого эффекта.
Также персонаж с мира-крепости может повышать значение Воли, даже если выбранный архетип этого не позволяет.

languages.text:
ネバーストップ・シューティングの全てのスタックがなくなると、スタック数は{uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf}となる。
さらに要塞惑星のキャラクターは、現在のタイプによって制限されていても、自身の意志力の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}をアップグレードできる。
languages.original_text:

Additionally, a fortress world character may upgrade their Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their current archetypes do not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
ネバーストップ・シューティングの全てのスタックがなくなると、スタック数は<u>(WP/2)</u>となる。
さらに要塞惑星のキャラクターは、現在のドクトリンによって制限されていても、自身の意志力の特性をアップグレードできる。

ネバーストップ・シューティングの全てのスタックがなくなると、スタック数は{uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf}となる。
さらに要塞惑星のキャラクターは、現在のタイプによって制限されていても、自身の意志力の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}をアップグレードできる。

languages.text:
Tüm tetiği asla bırakma birikimlerinin sıfırlanması gerektiği yerde sıfır yerine {uip|Stacks|40edd34c2d9d4b2482603083309a3ecf} birikime dönüşürler.
Ayrıca bir kale dünya karakteri, mevcut arketipi izin vermese bile {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğini{/g} yükseltebilir.
